Objective
To protect UK households from avarice exploitation by utility companies.

That energy& other utility companies should be designated by the UK Treasury as “Companies of Special Interest.”
These would be proscribed because its core business has a direct influence on.
1.	The economy
2.	The cost of living
3.	The health & welfare of the general population
4.	National security
5.	Social/economic responsibilities to UK households.

CSI’s shall be required to conform to stricter regulation;

1	Submit full disclosure accounts
2	Be banned from using tax havens
3	Be closely monitored for tax avoidance
4	Have executive wages pegged to a percentage linked to the workforce
5	Be scrutinised & punished for profiteering
6	Be scrutinised & prosecuted for price fixing.
7	Have their shareholder payouts submitted for approval by The Treasury
8	Be stopped from asset stripping
9	Undertake not to conceal assets & profits
10	To work to a moral code not the legal/profit code.
